name: Olaf Zimniak
story: Krzysztof grew up in a small town in Poland. He was always interested in survival skills and spent most of his teenage years in the woods learning to hunt and fish. After serving in the Polish military, he was hired by a private security company and sent to different conflict zones around the world. He became disillusioned with the industry and ended up joining the Independent faction in the struggle for his home country's sovereignty.
